body: We need an after after. Lol... Well, we know how it's going to end anyway.

Yeah that girl who got ntrd gave in way too easily haha wtf. I live the ending of this bit where hes getting training and is gonna get better at sex to take her back, I wish laliberte would actually make the follow up where that happens; Its always great to see the ntr reversed.
